answers.answer: Yes, you can. You may want to contact the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation (JDRF), an organization that raises money to give to research towards a cure. They have a website, www.jdrf.org

Hi there-My daughter is a juvenile diabetic and I had t-shirts made to raise money for JDRF last Christmas which we sold at our store. (She did the artwork for them)- We raised $80,000 last year through all of our fundraising and support any and all efforts to find a cure for Juvenile Diabetes-I would be willing to donate the t-shirts that we had made to you if you would like to sell them to benefit JDRF-Please let me know if you are interested- I will send you a picture of  them-Thanks!m  Good luck to you in your efforts!!!!

question: how can i help support diabetes? can i earn money and donate it to help find a cure?
title: i am wondering
